Package tournament

Class GameMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tournament.GameMaster

  • public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Normal Form Round-Robin Tournament Simulator (NFRRTS for short, we'll keep working on the name)
    Version:
    2019.04.15
    Author:
    Marcus Gutierrez and Oscar Veliz

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Parameters:
        args - not using any command line arguments

      • match

        public static double[] match(Player p1,
                             Player p2,
                             int gameNumber)
        A single individual match between to players, the first player is row the second is column If a strategy for a player is invalid it will assign a payoff of -1337 to that player
        Parameters:
        p1 - row player
        p2 - column player
        gameNumber - game
        Returns:

      • updateResults

        public static void updateResults(double[][] matrix,
                                 double[] payoffs,
                                 int p1,
                                 int p2,
                                 double[] wins)
        Computes and stores the results of a match given the expected payoffs
        Parameters:
        matrix - Payoff Matrix
        payoffs - results of a match
        p1 - Player 1
        p2 - Player 2
        wins - data structure that stores wins

                               java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Want to visualize the results of a tournament? Call this function.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Payoff Matrix
        players - List of Players

        public static double[] calculateRegrets(double[][] matrix)

        array of regrets in the tournament

        Returns:
        array of reverse payoffs

      • calculateStabilities

        public static double[] calculateStabilities(double[][] matrix)
        Calculates the stabilities for every agents and stores them in the array. (Taken from GameUtils class in ega.games package.)
